Content:: M. D. Namal Karunaratne is a Sri Lankan politician and former member of the Parliament of Sri Lanka.[1] On 8 March 2007, Karunaratne was appointed to a Select Committee of Parliament to look into the alarming increase in traffic accidents.[2]  This article about a politician from North Western Province, Sri Lanka is a stub. You can help Wikipedia by expanding it.
